comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Patch applied to HEAD.  I'm going to make a few more changes to the docs before I commit those.

How does everyone feel about applying these changes to 2.0?  I'm thinking we might as well as it 
doesn't break anything. That that way we can also make use of the new docs in 2.0.

Mike
